what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: Survey Owner Cannot View Details of Completed Surveys from Employee View
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: In My surveys > Completed tab, most completed surveys have no View results button or any clickable action. Survey names are not clickable. Only a small subset of surveys display a View results link. Validated with bayzlander@bayzat.com (survey owner/publisher) — 9 out of 10 completed surveys had no action button.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Logged in as bayzlander@bayzat.com. My surveys > Completed shows 10 surveys, all published by Bayzlander. Only 1 has 'View results' button, remaining 9 have NO action. Survey names not clickable. The 1 survey with View results shows 'Responses hidden for anonymity reasons' (respondents < 3).

summary: Comprehensive validation completed for Surveys feature. All 3 survey creation methods tested end-to-end (From Scratch with 4 question types, Template-based with Weekly Pulse Survey, AI-assisted with 5 generated questions). Both test surveys saved as draft and confirmed in list view. Anonymous survey settings validated (On/Off toggle with participant awareness). Full Settings section explored: Survey period, Anonymous responses, Sharing content, Notifications & reminders (4 reminder intervals). Action menus validated by status: Draft (Duplicate, Delete draft) vs Completed (Duplicate, Re-open survey, Share results), confirming WOF-001 post-launch immutability. 7 templates available with estimated times. Engagement insights analytics validated (NPS: 66, 9 engagement categories, 60% response rate). NEW ISSUE DISCOVERED (WOF-003): Survey owner/publisher cannot view details for most completed surveys from employee My surveys view — 9 out of 10 surveys had no View results button; anonymity threshold hides results when < 3 respondents. 28 screenshots captured across all major flows.
